Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Mice harbouring an intragenic deletion in Snrpn are phenotypically normal , suggesting that mutations of SNRPN are not sufficient to induce PWS .

Let's think step by step.

1. Prader-Willi Syndrome (PWS)
2. SNRPN (gene name: Small Nucleolar RNA Polypeptide N)

The paragraph is discussing mutations in the SNRPN gene and their relationship to Prader-Willi Syndrome. Therefore, both Prader-Willi Syndrome and SNRPN are the identified disease entities in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
